sizeof(_TYPE_)
sizeof() is based on AHK_L Objects and supports both, ANSI and UNICODE version, so to use it you will require a href=url target=”http://www.autohotkey.com/forum/viewtopic” name=”http://www.autohotkey.com/forum/viewtopic”.php?t=43049>Lexikos AutoHotkey_L.exe</a or other versions based on it that supports objects.<br><br>nsizeof is used to calculate the size of structures or data types.
